scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test NODE_CONFIG_PERSIST_ON_CHANGE=N NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:. nyc --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --report-dir=test/reports/unit/ mocha test/unit/
scripts.test:func: NODE_ENV=test NODE_CONFIG_PERSIST_ON_CHANGE=N NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:. nyc --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --report-dir=test/reports/func/ mocha test/func/
